title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 790.13 - Transfers of interest by sole proprietors or partnerships
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 790.13 - Transfers of interest by sole proprietors or partnerships

State Regulations

An individual or partnership seeking Public Health

Council approval for the transfer of all or part of the ownership of the
business shall file, in addition to meeting the other applicable requirements
of this Part, information, documents and data as follows: (a) a photocopy of the applicant's executed
proposed certificate of doing business; (b) where the applicant is a partnership, full and true copies of all partnership agreements; (c) a declaration of the percentage of the
business to be transferred; (d) a
financial statement setting forth the purchase price of the interest in the
business being sold and the financial resources available to make such
purchase, or the basis on which such transfer is to be financed; (e) where any transfer is to be by gift, a
statement of the relationship between the donor and the donee; and
(f) such additional pertinent information or
documents necessary for Public Health Council consideration, as
requested. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
790.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
